name: (Almost) Accurate (almost) every RPG player Simulator 2018
description:
The Game (if it even fits criteria of such medium) is a simple platformer that we made during the weekend, or more like 8 hours in total for the sake of participating in Ludum Dare 42 Jam.

It's our first game made using Godot 3, and we had a lot to learn (during the jam of course, because who would like to do it in his spare time?)

The game will be still in development(we want to complete it after the jam ends.) It's current state doesn't represent what we intended to make in the first place, and so we mark it as a prototype :)

Screenshot of the main, yet unnamed character, whose main role is to find 1 hella big roll of toilet paper(1 kilo), and escape the damn train dungeon avoiding his only enemy, the spikes. Here pictured awaiting his certain death just before collision with one of his foes. 

Just to clarify why there is no music or any sounds,  the game takes place in dungeons, which happen to be situated somwhere between Jupiter and Mars, and you know, there is no sound in space.
